abstract: The effective SwiftUI font used in any given environment.

## Discussion

The font specified by environment, preferring first any developer spedified font, via [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/font], then any framework specified font, and finally the default SwiftUI font.

# default

**Type Property**

The effective SwiftUI font used in any given environment.

## Declaration

```swift
static var `default`: Font { get }
```

## Discussion

The font specified by environment, preferring first any developer spedified font, via [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/font], then any framework specified font, and finally the default SwiftUI font.
title: default
